EmailTemplate.name: GoDaddy Delegation Request - Launch Approval Form Received
EmailTemplate.subject: One Last Step to Launch Your Property Website!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your launch approval! We are excited to get your website live soon. However, we need access to the domain. When we sign into the account it triggers a code that expires after 10 minutes.
Can you please share access to your GoDaddy account by following these steps:
1. Go to your GoDaddy Account Settings. If you're not already logged in, you'll be prompted to log in.
2. Click Delegate Access.
3. In the People who can access my account section, click Invite to Access.
4. Enter NAME: Luxury Presence EMAIL: propertysites@luxurypresence.com
5. Access level: Products and Domains.
6. Click Invite. GoDaddy will send us an email invitation to access your account. 7. Respond to this email letting me know you granted the access so I can accept. GoDaddy will then send you an email telling you that I did!
Best,
Self Serve Property Websites Luxury Presence Phone: (310) 955-1077 Email: support@luxurypresence.com
